message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it closer to even. I'll take $55, and you can have $45.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's not wait any longer.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my counter-offer: $55 for me, $45 for you.  It's the best you'll get considering the inflation working against me.
